export default function WebsiteFooter() { const footerLinks = { product: ['Features', 'Integrations', 'Updates', 'FAQ', 'Pricing'], company: ['About', 'Blog', 'Careers', 'Manifesto', 'Press', 'Contact'], resources: ['Examples', 'Community', 'Guides', 'Docs'], legal: ['Privacy', 'Terms', 'Security'] }; return (
{/* Left decorative element with responsive positioning */}
{/* */}
{/* Right decorative element with responsive positioning */}
{/* */}
{/* Sign-up content */}

Sign up for free today

Celebrate the joy of accomplishment with an app designed to track your progress and motivate your efforts.

{/* Main footer with exact height */}
{/* Logo and tagline section */}
Effortlessly turn your ideas into a fully functional, responsive, no-code SaaS website.
{/* Footer links section */}
{Object.entries(footerLinks).map(([category, links]) => (

{category}

    {links.map((link) => (
  • {link}
    • ))}
))}
); }
